record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 980
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 980 -- (Senate - July 19, 2007)

[Page: S9643]

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I understand that H.R. 980 has been received from the House and is at the desk. I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title for the first time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 980) to provide collective bargaining rights for public safety officers employed by States or their political subdivisions.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask for its second reading but object to my own request.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be read for the second time on the next legislative day.
